statements: SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username FROM user_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT username, LENGTH(password_hash) AS password_length FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS num_roles FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, city FROM users WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT full_name, birth_date, city, country FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT username, email, full_name, city FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping WHERE role_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.id = user_role_mapping.user_id WHERE user_role_mapping.role_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_role_mapping ON users.id = user_role_mapping.user_id JOIN user_roles ON user_role_mapping.role_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT users.username, user_permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permission_mapping ON users.id = user_permission_mapping.user_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_permission_mapping.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
